## AuthContainer class

Skygear Auth APIs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AuthContainer<T extends BaseAPIClient> 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [currentSessionID](./node-client.authcontainer.currentsessionid.md) |  | <code>string &#124; null</code> | Session ID of current logged in user. |
|  [currentUser](./node-client.authcontainer.currentuser.md) |  | <code>User &#124; null</code> | Current logged in user. |
|  [extraSessionInfoOptions](./node-client.authcontainer.extrasessioninfooptions.md) |  | <code>ExtraSessionInfoOptions</code> | Extra session information to be submitted to server. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addLoginID(loginID)](./node-client.authcontainer.addloginid.md) |  | Adds new login ID to current user. |
|  [changePassword(newPassword, oldPassword)](./node-client.authcontainer.changepassword.md) |  | Changes user password. |
|  [deleteOAuthProvider(providerID)](./node-client.authcontainer.deleteoauthprovider.md) |  | Deletes OAuth SSO provider. |
|  [getSession(id)](./node-client.authcontainer.getsession.md) |  | Gets information on specified active user session. |
|  [linkOAuthProviderWithAccessToken(providerID, accessToken)](./node-client.authcontainer.linkoauthproviderwithaccesstoken.md) |  | Links with OAuth SSO provider using access token. |
|  [listIdentities()](./node-client.authcontainer.listidentities.md) |  | Lists all identities of current user. |
|  [listSessions()](./node-client.authcontainer.listsessions.md) |  | Lists all active user sessions. |
|  [login(loginID, password, options)](./node-client.authcontainer.login.md) |  | Login user with password. |
|  [loginOAuthProviderWithAccessToken(providerID, accessToken, options)](./node-client.authcontainer.loginoauthproviderwithaccesstoken.md) |  | Login with OAuth SSO provider using access token. |
|  [loginWithCustomToken(token, options)](./node-client.authcontainer.loginwithcustomtoken.md) |  | Login user with custom token. |
|  [logout(options)](./node-client.authcontainer.logout.md) |  | Logout current session. |
|  [me()](./node-client.authcontainer.me.md) |  | Refreshes and returns current user information. |
|  [removeLoginID(loginID)](./node-client.authcontainer.removeloginid.md) |  | Removes login ID from current user. |
|  [requestEmailVerification(email)](./node-client.authcontainer.requestemailverification.md) |  | Requests user email verification. |
|  [requestForgotPasswordEmail(email)](./node-client.authcontainer.requestforgotpasswordemail.md) |  | Requests password reset email. |
|  [requestPhoneVerification(phone)](./node-client.authcontainer.requestphoneverification.md) |  | Requests user phone SMS verification. |
|  [resetPassword(form)](./node-client.authcontainer.resetpassword.md) |  | Performs password reset. |
|  [revokeOtherSessions()](./node-client.authcontainer.revokeothersessions.md) |  | Revokes all other active user sessions. |
|  [revokeSession(id)](./node-client.authcontainer.revokesession.md) |  | Revokes the specified user session. |
|  [saveExtraSessionInfoOptions()](./node-client.authcontainer.saveextrasessioninfooptions.md) |  | Save extra session information. |
|  [signup(loginIDs, password, options)](./node-client.authcontainer.signup.md) |  | Sign up new user. |
|  [signupWithEmail(email, password, options)](./node-client.authcontainer.signupwithemail.md) |  | Sign up new user with email. |
|  [signupWithUsername(username, password, options)](./node-client.authcontainer.signupwithusername.md) |  | Sign up new user with username. |
|  [updateLoginID(oldLoginID, newLoginID)](./node-client.authcontainer.updateloginid.md) |  | Updates specified login ID for current user. |
|  [updateMetadata(metadata)](./node-client.authcontainer.updatemetadata.md) |  | Updates custom metadata of user. |
|  [verifyWithCode(code)](./node-client.authcontainer.verifywithcode.md) |  | Performs user verification. |
